column4: I cannot connect to the internet through terminal. Selecting network through NetworkManager Applet does the job, but when I'm in say recovery console, I can't.
open a terminal and run: tail -f /var/log/syslog. Then in another terminal re-run your connect script and look for clues as to where it is failing in the syslog
when the script completed, I could go to the given ip address which showed what my apache served, but nothing else
